rpgonline.gui

Interface GUIItem


  • public interface GUIItem
    A part of the GUI
    Author:
    Tomas

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
            org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container,
            org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame game,
            float s_width,
            float s_height)
        Render this GUI
        Parameters:
        g - The screen graphics.
        container - The game container holding this game.
        game - This game.
        s_width - The width of the screen (scaled).
        s_height - The height of the screen (scaled).

      • isCentered

        boolean isCentered()

        Indicated if coordinates should be centred.

        For example, if isCentered returns true then coordinates would be scaled so that (0, 0) is in the centre of the screen. If isCentered returns false then (0,0) is in the top left corner.

        Returns:
        true if coordinates should be centred. false otherwise.

      • update

        default void update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container,
                    org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame game,
                    int delta)

        Update the GUI.

        This method should be overridden by GUI elements with keyboard controls.

        Parameters:
        container - The game container holding this game.
        game - This game.
        delta - The time in milliseconds since the last update.
